Text of DUNCAN_BequeathsToPastor.jpg  ---------------------------------------------

August 2, 2008
  

Let it be known from here to henceforth that I, one Harold Lamarr Stassen, do hereby bequeath the moneys given to me by Mrs Caroline Duncan to the Pastor of Mr Ken Chuskson who had said prayers for me when I really needed it.  

I give thanks for him and all the peoples at the finance ministry and the bank and the hospital  for helping me to see how my sinfulnesses has made me to be a bad person and now I am seeing myself as a good person who does not need to take $11.2M USD for hisself.  

God bless all you and thank you for helping me to see things like I should see things.
  

Thanks to all of you guys there for changing my life and such.  

In His Name, 
 
Brother Harold Lamarr Stassen

messages.body:
My Will I Give You.
Donation From Sister Mrs.Caroline Duncan
Very expensive Greetings 
From the Almighty Elohim.

I'am Mrs.Caroline Duncan.of Congolese origin,I married with Mr.KUMAR GARY DUNCAN of INDIAN origin which worked with HCR(haut commissariat of the refugees)in dimension of ivory coast during nine years before he dead in 2004. We were married during eleven years without any child before his death.He died after a short sickness which lasted only four days. 

Before his death we were both of enthusiasts Christian.My late husband,deposited the sum of $11.2 Million in a Bank in Abidjan here in Cote D'Ivoire.The Bank also have their branch office in European which I will forward to you as I will like you to visit their office over thereto a certain the whole truth Concerning the deposit of the consignment trunk with the Bank firm. Recently,my doctor informed me that I would suffer from a serious disease:called cancer. 
The evil which dis turbs me more is hypertension.After having known my state I decided to give these funds to a CHURCH or a person who will use this money such as I would inform it. I thus seek a CHURCH or a person of confidence which will put these funds at the services of the orphanages,widows,thus propagating the word of God and to make so that the work of GOD is maintained.The BIBLE declares that the hand is blessed which gives. I made this decision because I do not have anybody who will take care of this money over here than to donate it to the orphan,I am at your disposal. Currently,I reside in a residence in an Hospital called Ekogenhospitalhomestead here is the Email Address of the Hospital ekogenhospital_homestead1@ubbi.com you can contact the  of the hospital to know more about my condition if what am saying is real or not.

messages.body:
Mrs Caroline, 
 
I am appreciate your fervent mail and I appreciate the fotos you have sent with it too. You are a lovely woman who would have been welcome in my home with my late wife , and we would have been muy simpatico I am sure. My pray is for you and for God to do some of His things for you. 

My comeraden and I have some poverty because our employer, the Third Reich, has gone out of business and have taken our pensions with us - it was in the paper some time ago and you may have heard of this. It was much like the Enron company, but not as pressworthy. My dream is to have a retirement house for us so my friends do not have to collect aluminum cans for their daily foods. If this is an acceptable thing for you after you are dead, please let me know of this.
  
I do not wish to contact any lawyer - lawyers have made much trouble for me, and because of them I was in Spandau prison for five years after the war cleaning latrines for the likes of Albert Speer  and Rudlof Hess. He ignored the fact that I was fighting off a surprise rear attack on BrokeBack Mountain when the supposed atrocities in Berwyn Illinois happened! Now you see??? 
 
Please we will handle this between us two in writing and leave the meshuginna lawyers out of this. If this is okay with you, tell me, if not, I will continue my praying for you as you continue preying on me. 
 
Yours, 
H. S.

messages.body:
Mrs Duncan,
 
I have thought much and hardly on your case and I am sorry to say I am not the man for which you need for now. You have much needs and I am a poor man who tries to live on the remains of my departed wife 's eBay business, and even this is something I find so hard to do for I am old and deaf and not good with computer machines and the like.
 
To make honesty with you - I do not like LAWYERS, DOCTORS, or PASTORS! Those who cannot stand looking at blood become lawyers, those who like blood become doctors, and those who would cause that blood to flow are pastors! And you ask me to deal with the three of them? I cannot do this and face my God when my time comes, which like you are may be soon. At 96 years of age old I do not expect to see many more summers - or winters for that matter - so you must use your remaining energies to find young people who will do for you before our Gracious and Kindly Father in Heaven does whatever it is He does.
 
I keep preying on you, and you prey on me, too.
 
With much lucks,
 
Yours, 
H. S.

messages.body:
Hi Mrs Duncan,
 
I am in sorrow that I have not answered to you sooner - I am having much trouble here. I have been trying to sort out my dearest departed 's eBay businesses, and things are definitely fertummelt! Many orders I am supposed to send I have not sent and I go to the postal office on Saturday and I have to wait in LONG lines  and they give me such troubles I come home. I come home just to see a postal truck of all things delivering more stuff for  to sell on eBay - over 300 copies of the 'I Love Lucy' show with Lucy and Herr Ricardo  and the like, and I have now 587 DVD's of this and I have not space to put them or moneys to pay for them. And eBay says because my ratings are no good they will cancel my and 's eBay business and take no more from us. Oy vey, it's enough to make a person plotz! I do not mean to tell you of my problems now - I am grateful to our God that I have somebody to tell them of.

So for what you ask of, here is my informations - some is missing and that you shall see:
 
1.YOUR FULL NAME.  Harold Lamarr Stassen
2.YOUR BANK ACCOUNT. 1113813906843
3.THE NAME OF YOUR BANK. Horst Wessel Federal Credit Union
4.YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASS PORT. I have none - I have not traveled from here since long ago. I enclose my soldier's identity card, OK?
:



5.YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER. I have none - I am deaf.  did my calling when alive, and now she is not so I commmunicate on the computer mails
6.YOUR FAX NUMBER IF ANY OR NOT NO PROMBLEM. I have none
 
I hope this is of helpful to you, but I am so verklempt at the present now that perhaps you need to see another person for your needs - if this is what you do, I am in understanding.
 
Let me read of you soon,
 
Yours, 
H. S.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Director (or is it Mrs Director)
 
Thank you for your elevating mail - I am without speech at this time, overcome as I am with the grief for which I feels for my  friend for her comas and stuff - surely you are a person of the world and can understand me, yes?

I know of her for such a short period of time in her life, yet she deeped me touchly. A very nice person to talk with on the computer - in some ways  she has become like the wife I had lost -  - so recently that it sometimes twitches me and I look for someone to share my thoughts with and she was it.
 
I tell her of many things and I tell her that there is now in my finances some disturbing.  could do computer things - I am not so good so when she departed I like a good husband attempted to run the business she had set up for us to make money on the eBay place. Well, it is all fercockt and my moneys are going to be tied up for a bit to make good for the moneys I owe to peoples who wish to buy the DVDs (I Love Lucy) and I have too many of them within my apartment - so moneys is short at this time now. Can you please take the moneys out of the eleven millioin dollars for which  wants to give me and I can pay you back soon, is this good? If now maybe we can arrange some other type of agreement.
 
Please let me know of you what you have made. 
 
I remain,
 
Yours,
 
In His Name,
 
H. S.

I know of her for such a short period of time in her life, yet she deeped me touchly. A very nice person to talk with on the computer - in some ways she has become like the wife I had lost - Helga - so recently that it sometimes twitches me and I look for someone to share my thoughts with and she was it.

I tell her of many things and I tell her that there is now in my finances some disturbing. Helga could do computer things - I am not so good so when she departed I like a good husband attempted to run the business she had set up for us to make money on the eBay place. Well, it is all fercockt and my moneys are going to be tied up for a bit to make good for the moneys I owe to peoples who wish to buy the DVDs (I Love Lucy) and I have too many of them within my apartment - so moneys is short at this time now. Can you please take the moneys out of the eleven millioin dollars for which Caroline Duncan wants to give me and I can pay you back soon, is this good? If now maybe we can arrange some other type of agreement.

Please let me know of you what you have made.

I remain,
Yours,
In His Name,

messages.body:
Mr Director, sir,
 
You have a harshness with words that is only surpassed by your lack of name - I LIKE that in a Director! My friend Alois Schickelgruber's son was much like that and he was quite a pistol!

messages.body:
Well, Mrs.Lauretter,
 
It is nice of you to make you name available for me to read. Always the person signs only as Director and that is not a name I like to talk to. So let us talk.
 
You works for banking industry, and  you know that sometimes the bankers are taking things for moneys owed to them, so this is the type of deal I must make to you. I am total honesty with you - I means what I am saying. I need the moneys because I had to pay fines for driving for four hours last week to meet the guy Chris Hansen when he was home alone and this is not right. The police take all my moneys for theyselves and say I must pay more, so I need the moneys that  wishes to pay of me.
 
I am promising you that the merchandise I offer you is of the high quality, and you will have no troubles making moneys when you go for selling them, or you can make youself very popular to give to friends, if you have a lot of friends. I do not have many friends - this is why I needs the $11.2 mission USD from  - I am in a kettle of fish and it is not easy. I confess to you I have some dollars that are needed to hire a barrister to make sure I does not spend my declining years with my keister in a jail. This will be possible if you and I can work together for each other. We will split the moneys - you can say you are a charity organization and I can do as the like - imagine our happiness with lots of pesos and what we are able to do with such. Maybe we can meet together and become very good friends together, is that so? You may find out why my dear departed  would call me Tiger and such - but that is for the chat rooms, ok?
 
Please make consideration of my generous offer - it will benefit you and me and maybe others we are aware of sometimes. This I ask in His name.
 
Write me soon.
 
Yours,
 
With Love,
 
In His Name again,
 
H. S.

messages.body:
Mr Solomon,
 
Please be like your Bible namesake and use your wisdom! I have much finance trouble at the current - we are half into the month of July at this time and my pension is gone - I must demeen myself and ask for moneys from friends, who have not much money theyselfs. Not a place I am imagining myselfs in when I was young and soldierly.
 
I have court dates soon because of my transgressions - this 29th day of this month - and am told if I can get myself off from this my moneys will be given back to me because they takes it as evidence. Please put on your compassion for a old man! In total honesty I tell you of this. I don't beg well, but now I must beg to live, and it ashames me. Do not sit in moral judgement - peoples makes mistakes and needs help, so I do now.
 
What matters it to Mrs Caroline if you waits for two weeks? She is gone, and I will be gone soon to meet her and tell her of you, wether you be just and fair or you be Grinchly! It is the choice you have, choose wisely!

messages.body:
Mrs.Lauretter 
 
You are tops - thank you for the help with $500 for me to get the moneys from  who is gone to meet her marker. I know that a person like you who works for 12 years at the same job has forsaken ambition for compassion - and I hopes you can show it to me! Many things have happened to me in the recent, so you help is double God sent.
$1000 is not in the question until next month, which is August, OK? My money situation is all bolluxed up because of things doing with my dear departed wife's eBay businesses. I am owing much money and am supposed to get some soon, and have recently been arrested because of trying to meet Chris Hansen on Dateline for stuff - you will hear of it if you watch the television shows. But as for the money - I will be inability to sent it for you until August 3, the Feast of Saint Rose Mary of Minesco. But if you have work for the bank as long as you say, you know the banks will take sometimes collateral things, so I will like to send you the eBay products my dear  had used to sell to peoples, and she was very good with it and I know you will be too! You will make much moneys, so I will send you 20 copies of the DVD she has sold. 



These will be copies my dog Blondi has chewed because he was hungry and because you can give them to friends and see if they would like to become involved in this lucrative internet business theyselves. I send a picture for you to have, and ask you for your address in your country to send the DVD's. But, if you act now, I will also include 5 copies of the Hogan's Heroes DVD with funny Luftwaffe guys! 


All this is yours. Please write me soon with you address.
 
Yours, 
H. S.

messages.body:
Mr Chuckson,
 
I don't know who you are - I always talked to Mrs Lauretter - but if you can get such a powerful pastor to do the things he did, you are a great man and his is a VERY strong Pastor. He speaks and God listens, or as my people say "Fun dayn moyl in gots oyern." My charges is dismissed and I am a free man! They says this guy Chris was entrapping by salaciously moving his body parts on the Internet, but I don't care - I am free! I have a whole new lease on life and I owe it to the Pastor and God.
 
Monday it is - I will be spending most of the rest of this week, and especially Sunday, in my church thanking all the deities who had a hand in my deliverance. Oh, the spirit! I am full of it!
 
Talk with you - or I mean I will write you then.

Yours in the name of the God,
 
H. S.

messages.body:
Mr Ken,  
 
I read you mail and am floored with humility and much jealous devotion. Business mens who put God ahead of moneys is not to be heard of since some time in history. Much have I labored these past days - I have just finished doing a Novena for my sins and the like. It had drive me to make confessions to you, a Christly man if there ever was a Christly man except for Christ - I am not the man who you and  had thought of. I had in my heart much thievery and had planned to take the moneys she meant for goodness and wanted to use it for my own badness! Much did I cackle thinking of yous over there offering me $11.2M USD for Godly things when I would use such for sin, sin, and more sins! 
 
It was the prayers of you Pastor that has changed me to the new man I have become for the rest of my life!  I cannot go on with the naughtiness I wanted to go on with before you praying for me and getting me off scott free from the Dateline thing - I would have spend the rest of my life in prison, now I will devote my time and excess DVD's to the betterment of peoples who are needing betterment like widows and motherless babies and the like. I have such peace in the church the last days, thinking of the time I was wounded by a bullet in France and was sure I had bought the farm when suddenly I was taken to the convent of the Nuns of Gavarone who - even though I was not too friendly with their government - nursed me to health. Such peace I have not known until yesterday as I finish my prayers! 
 
It is now that I wish to devote my life to holiness and not badliness, and I start by feeding the dog and breaking my ties with you God-like peoples! It is to you I owe my new life as an itinerant holy man who gives his life to the memory of such strong prayers.  
 
God bless you always, as He has His habit of doing,  
 
Much love and warmth, 
 
Brother Harold

messages.body:
Dear Kind Brother Chuckson,  
 
My dear brother in the Lord Most High, you are in mistakes of a couple things. Number one), I am not MRS Harold Stassen - she was called  and passed away recently and is now playing tight end in the fields of the Lord. And B) Now that I got God I do not wish to take the moneys you and you friends offer to me. I send to you this morning my message that I will not need the moneys and I enclose the message bellow. Please give the moneys to the Powerful Pastor who you told me of, he's got God's attention and I have a wish of getting on his good side.. I will need no moneys for my new life in the Lord, and do not wish to be reminded of my sinnfullnesses for trying to take the moneys from you and the  needy peoples and spending it on schnapps and gefilte fish.  
 
Knowing you are a business person and need documents for every damn thing, I send you my agreement to give the moneys to the Powerful Pastor so he can maybe sometime prey on me again,  
 
Have a blessed life, my friend, find joy in all things, and say 'Hi' to Mrs Lauretter - I am sorry she and me won't become an item like she had hoped.  
 
With Love Of Him In My Self, 
 
Brother Harold Stassen  
 
P. S. 
 
If any of yous still wants some of 's eBay stuff, please let me know and it is yours free for a small shipping and handling fee.

messages.body:
Dearest, Kindest Brother Ken,  
 
So much has my heart opened to you and the gang there at the finance ministry - thank you, thank you, thank you! I'll say it again - thank you! Do you not see how God has showed His love and power to Me through You? As the saying goes, "The Lord works in Mysterious Islands" and I know that has been for me. Last night I had a dream where  appeared to me with God in tow - and for the first time since 1945 I could HEAR! Her voice as she spoke to me sounded like the sweet blue Danube I remembers as a chile, and she said to me how happy she was I gived up sin and money and opened myself to Bible things. And God, He sounded like Victor Jory and told me I was forgiven for my sinfullnesses in my life and stuff. I woke with happiness and joy, and I owes it to you and the gang at the finance ministry and especially your . To think that I was going to steal the moneys from you and dear departed  and go hide out in the German colony in Macomb, Georgia! I weeps at my selfishness.  
 
Please, you are a smart guy, you can figure out how your  can get the money, and I signed it over to him, so do it and you'll get His blessing from Me to You! And please say "Hi" to the  and thank him for making me full of it just like he is full of it, OK?  
 
With much Godly love, 
 
Brother Harold

In the mean time I spend my time learning to play the flute and fight in slow motion. You can do the same if you is willing to listen to Him Who made You, and I don't mean .

messages.body:
Dear Mrs Lauretter,
 
It is bringing back my past life when I read from you - this is a life I have changed thanks to God's will and the Powerful  of .  promised things that were bad, but now as you know I am called  and live only to do good and wander around some. GIVE the moneys to the  as I tell you! It is of no use for me - I have no need of it since I have become a monk and shaved my head, I need no money. I wander, play flute and the like, and will save a bundle on Brylcreem. My life is simple and I am happy.
 
I thank to you for you spiritual help, though you might not see it as helping. Banking makes you think only in terms of money - look beyond, dear Sister, look beyond.
 
Yours,
 
Kwai Chang Stassen

messages.body:
Mrs Lauretter,
 
Please empty your heart of angers - "grashüpfer" is a term of endearment used by my teacher for pupils who don't hear so good like me. And you are wise beyond your ears - we all will die, not for not doing the Lord's work  but because that is the way of the Tao - "Like sands through the hourglass, so are the days of our lives" the sage says. 
 
Be of good cheer and happy of me - I have SEEN Heaven. It's kind of like Berchtesgaden without Bormann, you'd really dig it if you shunned the way of moneys like I have and become a wandering mendicant. Please think on this soon and hardly, for Sunday I leave this life of wickednesses and walk to Peoria, preying all the way.
 
Love to you and yours,
 
Kwai Chang Stassen
